    public abstract class AbstractLeaseRenewalServiceTest
extends QATestEnvironment
implements Test

      • getLRS

        public net.jini.lease.LeaseRenewalService getLRS(int index)
        Returns an instance of the Nth LeaseRenewalService requested.

        Notes:


        The number of LeaseRenewalServices started is determined by the net.jini.lease.LeaseRenewalService.instances Property value.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the LeaseRenewalService to be returned.
        Returns:
        the Nth instance of the requested LeaseRenewalServices
        Throws:
        IllegalArugumentException - If index is less than 0.
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If index is greater than or equal to the number of LRS proxy instances.
        See Also:
        construct(QAConfig)

      • getLRS

        public net.jini.lease.LeaseRenewalService getLRS()
        Convenience method always returns the first LRS proxy instance.
        Returns:
        the 1st instance of the requested LeaseRenewalServices
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If index is greater than or equal to the number of LRS proxy instances.
        See Also:
        construct(QAConfig)
